sections.title: Introduction & Goal
sections.summary: Presenter states the goal: to extend GitHub Copilot capabilities by using MCP servers.
key_actions: Announce intention to give more power to GitHub Copilot
Introduce MCP servers as the mechanism to extend Copilot

sections.title: Out-of-the-box MCP Tools Overview
sections.summary: Describes the default tools available for MCP and notes the current available ones (GitHub Copilot local and .NET aggregate assistance).
key_actions: Review list of built-in MCP tools

sections.title: Selecting Additional Servers (GitHub, Microsoft Learn/Docs)
sections.summary: Presenter selects additional MCP servers to add: GitHub and a Microsoft Learn / Microsoft Docs source for quick documentation access.
key_actions: Identify desired MCP servers to add (GitHub, Microsoft Docs/Learn)
Refer to configuration instructions for adding servers

sections.title: Create mcp.json in Solution Root
sections.summary: Demonstrates creating a new file named (name).mcp.json in the root of the solution to register MCP servers.
key_actions: Name the file <name>.mcp.json (placed in solution root)

sections.title: Add GitHub Server Configuration & Authentication Notes
sections.summary: Copies the GitHub server config into mcp.json, explains server cache/connection status and that authentication will use Visual Studio's local credentials to authenticate to GitHub, enabling many GitHub-related tools.
key_actions: Copy GitHub server configuration into mcp.json
Authenticate when prompted using Visual Studio local credentials
Observe that many GitHub tools become available after authentication
ui_elements: Server status indicators (in cache, not connected)

sections.title: Add Microsoft Docs Server & Verify in Copilot Chat Tools
sections.summary: Adds Microsoft Docs configuration to the MCP file and verifies in Copilot's assistant/chat mode that the new Microsoft Docs and GitHub Copilot tools appear in the Tools pane.
key_actions: Add Microsoft Docs (Microsoft Learn) configuration to mcp.json
Open GitHub Copilot in assistant (chat) mode
Open Tools panel to confirm Microsoft Docs and GitHub tools are listed

main_topics: MCP (Managed Connector Provider) servers for GitHub Copilot
Creating and editing mcp.json in solution root
Adding third-party or documentation servers (GitHub, Microsoft Docs)
Authentication via Visual Studio local credentials
Verifying tools in GitHub Copilot assistant chat (Tools pane)
